text: Milos Raonic (born December 27, 1990) is a Canadian professional tennis player.ATP profile Raonic was born in Titograd, Socialist Republic of Montenegro, Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia. He moved to Brampton, Ontario, Canada in 1994. He lives in Monte Carlo, Monaco. His uncle is Montenegrin politician Branimir Gvozdenov√≠c. Raonic is the most successful Canadian singles player. He turned pro in 2008. He represented Canada at the 2012 Summer Olympics. His world ranking peaked at no. 3 in November 2016. He was the losing finalist of the 2016 Wimbledon Championships. == References == Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian tennis players Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Competitors at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Male tennis players Category:Montenegrin sportspeople Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada Category:Sportspeople from Ontario
title: Milos Raonic
